title: What is the purpose of the 'clone' command in Git?

options.a: To create a duplicate of a Git repository on your local machine

title: In Git, what does the 'pull' command do?

options.a: To pull an object with a rope

options.b: To update a remote repository with your local changes

options.a: To add a new software feature

options.a: A testing environment for web applications
options.b: A place where changes are marked for the next commit

options.a: To find the difference between two numbers
options.b: To compare changes between the working directory and the staging area
